sections.text: Burden of proof; orderIf the court finds by clear and convincing evidence that the minor has a mental illness or suffers from substance abuse of such severity that hospitalization is necessary and that he can benefit from inpatient treatment, it shall order his continued confinement in a designated treatment facility which is medically suitable and least restrictive of his liberty.Acts 1991, No. 235, ยง14, eff. Jan. 1, 1992.
